job.title: Site Reliability Engineer, Data Platform
job.description: pstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppstrongspan classqlcursorspanstrongppTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and TokyoppbrppSite Reliability Engineering SRE combines software and systems engineering to build and run largescale massively distributed services and infrastructures As a site reliability engineer in the data platform team you will have the opportunity to manage the services and infrastructures in one of the largest dataplaforms in the world Youll need to ensure the data services and infrastructures are reliable faulttolerant efficiently scalable and costeffective Youll also have the opportunity to design build and deliver all kinds of systems as a software engineerppbrpp Ensure reliable faulttolerant efficiently scalable and costeffective data services and infrastructurespp Establish solid design and best engineering practice for engineers as well as nontechnical peoplepp Design and build data transformations efficiently and reliably for different purposes eg reporting growth analysis multidimensional analysispp Design and implement reliable scalable robust and extensible big data systems that support core products and businesspp Our team are working on various directions in the data infra and data product area Dont hesitate to contact us if youre interestedpp Query Engine that support adhocinteractive queries and batch pipelinespp Logging amp Ingestion Infra that logs and ingests large amount of data in realtimepp Experimentation Platform that supports the AB testing for all product and feature launchespp Workflow Management Platform that programmatically authors schedules and monitors workflows such as streaming and batch taskspp Distributed Cache that accelerates computepp Various data products such as data visualization tool user behaviour analysis tool user profiling toolpp Data Engineering that support business productspp MoreppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpp BS or MS degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experiencepp Experience in the Big Data technologiesHadoop MR Hive Spark Metastore Presto Flume Kafka ClickHouse Flink etcpp Experience with performing data analysis data ingestion and data integrationpp Solid communication and collaboration skillsppbrppTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace At TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach We believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are tooppbrppTikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process If you need assistance or an accommodation please reach out to us at usrctiktokcomp
